saas.name: Twitter Search
saas.heading: Instant Twitter Search
saas.subheading: **Powerful & instant search** across all your tweets and likes that syncs regularly. Powered by Algolia.

pricingPlans.name: Free
features: Search across your 100 most recent tweets
Syncing with your Twitter activity is disabled
Perfect to try things out before upgrading

pricingPlans.name: Pro
features: Full Algolia search across all your personal and liked tweets
Regular syncing of your Twitter activity
The world's fastest and most relevant personal Twitter search
